text: Would be nice to have a way to disable a template without uninstalling it. Or at least exclude it from publishing selection.  Make sense ?
Hey <@UHDG0EEF9> you should be able to use this toggle in the DM to hide the template from being able to be selected during page creation
Is this what you were referring to?

Yes, a little bit, but from Marketplace perspective -  When you view a purchased template from the Asset Marketplace, its only possible to Uninstall it, maybe it would be nice to have Disable function too ?
Templates purchased should have that toggle button also i believe, can you DM a link (from your portal) to one of the templates you purchased in your portal?
